author: rhuijben
msg: Print an 'F' instead of a '.' for a failing test.

author: rhuijben
msg: (run_one_test): Remove parallel argument. This argument doesn't do anything
and is broken. The real parallel support is handled at another level.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r38648, also connect the access batons of switch operations
to the wc_ctx. This fixes the externals tests on Windows and allows provides
more information on the current Unix buildbot failures.
access batons except one very short living in the wc_ctx.
